attributes.action: Remove our troops from,Afkhaistan and Iraq.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Trying to save the lives of our troops,
who are fighting a losimg battle,against an enemy who do not wear a uniform,or can be identified.
If the russians and americans cannot take control of the countries,what chance,do our boys and girls stand.7 murdered in the last week alone,so if you love our children,and grandchildren who are being murdered in these god forsaken holes,sign the petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
